website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, attractive, and popular basketball shoes that offer the notable performance you'd expect from the brand.
pros: Footbed offers decent cushioning that does a good job absorbing shock
cons: May require a break-in period, but they typically feel comfortable for most owners within a few days of wear

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes But Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, look good and fit good to size. Size is the same as vans, and 1 size down from Nike. Unfortunately these arrived damaged. I scooped them up because of a nice price drop but I'm guessing this is why. Seems like a dishonest seller.
customer_reviews.author: reviews of the fooot

customer_reviews.title: True to size; Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman’s size 10 (typically a men’s 8). I ordered an 8.5 (a half size larger) because I anticipated wearing a thick sock during winter season. With a thick sock, I have space to wiggle my toes and walk comfortably. I love them! They compliment my sweatsuit very well. They’re true to size, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: True to size and stylish looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of shoes as a gift for my brother. I was worried about so many things when ordering it at the last minute online but they were just perfect. They look exactly as shown in pictures. True to size, comfortable to wear and very stylish. My brother loved them.
customer_reviews.author: VD

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks good, but hurts when walking
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking shoes and I got a couple of compliments when I wore them. I just couldn't stand how they hurt my right toe every time I put them on. I think the design is flawed because it doesn't see how the folding of the shoe at the front will impact the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: All Adidas run larger! Greatly constructed shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has some arch support but for all intents and purposes is a shoe for show. I purchased for my daughter. She is 13 and wears an 11 MENS. However being that adidas runs larger a 10 fit with a little space. Going a size or a size and a half down is appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Do not ignore reviews.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought, so what its not the original, just like the comments say. Its pretty cheap and I'll rock around with that brand logo. When it arrived, just right out of the package, it was a major disappointment. Neglecting the fact that the sole was flip flop quality and the material was cheap, the right foot show was completely off stitched. What an absurd blunder. I tried to convince myself its okay but its not. A cheap $10 shoe from Walmart gave me more comfort and assurance. Sad to see amazon ruin brand names.
customer_reviews.author: Laran

customer_reviews.title: The packaging /box
customer_reviews.text: The packaging/adidas box was completely destroyed. It made it look as if the adidas box was tampered with and initially I thought the shoes were used. The shoes look ok but no one wants to give a gift that looks like these did!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Adidas action
customer_reviews.text: I dig them. Very stylie. And I got them on sale. I'm a size 13, and these are true to fit right out of the box. The break in time was minimal. Some people have complained that they're too narrow. I have a wide foot, and I don't have that problem at all. Some of y'all must have some seriously wide foot action going on. I didn't rate the durability since they're new, but for everything else they're good to go. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Fafenrodt

customer_reviews.title: Not too comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Its ture to size so of your a 8.5 US get that size. In uptown I get a 9 for extra room and so I ordered these in a 9 and they were way way too big. Not too comfortable to walk around in all day.
customer_reviews.author: Bad bunny

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good but not great because when I took ou the right side shoe it looked like it had been worn already and the shoe strings were dirty. If if weren't for that those would've been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hall

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are REALLY comfortable and I love how they bring me back to the 80's! I ordered my usual size men's 4.5 (women's 6.5). I have a wide foot and these are really great!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Calender

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers for a 56 year old. Very comfortable. Thanks. I'm a size 9 regular. Most common size. Fit me perfectly. Order what you wear.
customer_reviews.author: Karl L.

customer_reviews.title: For narrow feet only!
customer_reviews.text: This will only fit if you have narrow feet!!! I'll have to return it. Otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: carly o.

customer_reviews.title: Always read the reviews before buying the product.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. They fit great! I really appreciate amazon sending me the picture of my packages.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He really liked the look and feel. He’s received compliments from his friends. Would purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Ventilated
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe that these are really adidas but they are. They are very poorly ventilated and if your feet need to breathe they will be a problem for you.
customer_reviews.author: AL70

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them! Will definitely purchase in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly_side

customer_reviews.title: Why have they been worn?!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and you can clearly tell that they've been worn. I am NOT happy
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase decision on my end
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a clean white pair of sneakers, but came across this pair and decided to get it as I tend to buy more mid to high top sneakers. This pair of Adidas feels comfortable, fits properly, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: mehedee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son will only wear Adidas. And gives these his stamp of approval. Fit great. Feet stay warm and dry .
customer_reviews.author: Plentiful32

customer_reviews.title: Love This Classic Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great classic sneaker. Looks great with a pair of jeans. Great price and value. I purchased 3 colors of the same shoe!
customer_reviews.author: IZZY

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable and fit well. It's not every sneaker you can find in a size 14 that are comfortable AND affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Mick Blues

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoes, they are comfortable and of premium quality. The sole of the shoe is good and is not harsh on the foot. Overall: Good, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Suraj

customer_reviews.title: Love these high top Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this exact same pair about every six months. Perfect fit and they look dope AF!
customer_reviews.author: Barbon562

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Runs about 1/2 size big.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple oldschool RUN DMC style. Runs big. I'm 10 1/2 in Adidas, but 10 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Kenty

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Fit perfect. Look better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for men's shoes like these for years
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for men's shoes like these for years! I wear them all the time, and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Honey Loved His Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift. My honey loved them. This is his 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Coqui873

customer_reviews.title: Mom win!
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit with my ever-growing 12 yr old son! I appreciate the throwback style and simply classic colors in black and white. He appreciates the comfort and durability. It was a price and arrived right on time. I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: andrea burkes

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an adidas fan and loves these .
customer_reviews.author: KCDREAM

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit nice I am a 10/11 in womens got a 8.5 they fit fine and I got wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are sturdy and give plenty of ankle support. The run about a half size bigger than my Nikes or New Balances.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name (required)

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, awful box
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. They look great and I’m sure they will fit him fine, but the box they came in was so heavily damaged. Whoever shipped it just put the adidas box in a shipping bag. Really bummed I have to give him these in such an awfully destroyed box.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, these are some of the cleanest nicest shoes I own now
customer_reviews.author: Andrew pope

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Quick ship. Well priced. Made my teenager happy, and that's everything
customer_reviews.author: Chana

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the shoes are made like boots
customer_reviews.text: I got the shoes and I want to keep them Only the box was destroyed the shoes were fine
customer_reviews.author: Francisco De La O

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased
customer_reviews.text: first time buying shoes on amazon... came on time, fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Krizzhit

customer_reviews.title: Hey Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking and comfortable sneakers. Fits as expected! Not much to say.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Came early than expected. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes great fit, kinda hurt my feet for the first couple of days. But after a few days they are ok. Would I buy them again? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Son loves thses
customer_reviews.text: My 13 y/o son loves this and fits wonderful. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: michael w. mckitrick

customer_reviews.title: The mid insole runs kind of narrow. Good if you don’t suffer from wide feet
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with the sneakers. Right size, good value. If your feet are not so wide they should fit you perfectly. Having said that they were not so confortable for me so I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Tomatito

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size, buying shoes on Amazon was a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why ever thought ordering clothing on Amazon was a good idea. They never fit correctly and the return process was super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, great material (it’ll last long), and fits perfectly, amazing quality for the price, honestly surprised me, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HeyitsHouston

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: After only a month and half, the bottom of both sneakers have holes. My husband wore them only two or three times a week for two hours. Unacceptable, and cannot get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jennine Shpigel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my husband for Father's Day and he loved them!
customer_reviews.author: AFig

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. Exactly what I wanted when I clicked “purchase.” The shoes came flawless. The box was a little beat up, but that’s the mails fault I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Trystan Holt

customer_reviews.title: My adidas
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this sneaker were sold out every where. Glad I found them on Amazon. They fit great and look great with jeans or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, stylish shoes, wear them when heading out and always cleaning them to maintain their whiteness
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Snug Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning they felt much tighter than expected, but after a couple of wears they fit perfectly and improved my posture.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. I'm an Adidas customer for 30 years. I expect comfort, fit and durability. They almost always deliver.
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome, comfortable sneakers. Worth at least twenty more dollars. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal hate paying a lot for sneakers good price i will be back a1 rating fast delivery...nuff said
customer_reviews.author: marvin watson

customer_reviews.title: For people with narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe just needs to be wider. When will adidas bring bad stylish wide shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: They look even better in person. Fit perfect and look nice. Comfortable to walk in too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Item packaging was destroyed on arrival, but who's to blame? Otherwise a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Good price might buy some more if the quality stays as good or gets better.
customer_reviews.author: ElPeriko

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: You slip in these shoes and you feel very comfortable regardless of the occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Nunez

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I BOUGHT THESE FOR THE HUBBYS BIRTHDAY!! ND HE LOVED THEM!! THEY ARE SO NICE AND NO THEY ARENT FAKE I DOUBLE TRIPLE MADE SURE!! BUT DEF RECOMMEND I NEED TO GO AHEAD AND BUY MYSELF SOME AS WELL!! HOPEFULLY BEFORE THEY SELL OUT!!
customer_reviews.author: Daze

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Hoops 2.0 Mid Sneaker
product_meta.description: Mid-top style with a premium look. These men's basketball-inspired shoes boast luxe style with a suede upper on a tinted cupsole. Two-tone laces offer a fashionable touch.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top" from arch
Boot opening measures approximately 0-3 inches around
Die-cut EVA sockliner for lightweight cushioning
